definition: program bringing education to underdeveloped areas/to work in such a program
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

sentences.english: I will go to a villiage in Guizhou, working as a volunteer teacher.
sentences.chinese: 我要去貴州一個小山村支教。

sentences.english: After came to the moutains, she posts some articles and photos about the life there from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 她支教後，不時貼一些關於當地生活的文章照片。

sentences.english: Working for a year as a volunteer teacher made her more mature.
sentences.chinese: 一年的支教經歷讓她成熟了不少。

sentences.english: I will go to a village in Guizhou, working as a volunteer teacher.
sentences.chinese: 我要去貴州一個小山村支教。

sentences.english: For one thing, volunteers can benefit a lot from their volunteer teaching.
sentences.chinese: 首先，志願者可以從他們的支教中獲益匪淺。

sentences.english: Is my poor draw. thnks to look it.
sentences.chinese: 是電腦裏畫的，畫得不好，多支教。

sentences.english: For one thing volunteers can benefit a lot from their volunteer teaching.
sentences.chinese: 首先，志願者可以從他們的支教中獲益匪淺。

sentences.english: Go to migrant children in primary schools to teach children.
sentences.chinese: “去民工子弟小學支教”用英文怎麼說？

sentences.english: On our first teaching day, we planned to do rugby and art with the kids.
sentences.chinese: 支教第一天，我們計劃教孩子們橄欖球和美術。

sentences.english: And I was the head of the Grade Three Group in program of Supported Educational Undertakings.
sentences.chinese: 在山區支教的活動中我也擔任了三年級組的負責人。

sentences.english: In 2010, he went to Yunnan Province to help the education in west part of China.
sentences.chinese: 2010年赴雲南支教，幫助中國西部教育改善。

sentences.english: In order to prepare for my post, I attended several primary school classes in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 由於想爲支教做好準備，我曾到北京幾所小學去聽課。

sentences.english: Every year they send 100 volunteers to teach in China's rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 每年他們派出100名志願者到中國的農村地區支教。

definition: pro-Tibet/to support Tibet/to support Tibetan independence
"left-behind children", rural children whose parents have to make a living as migrant workers in distant urban areas, but cannot afford to keep the family with them
to study away from home or abroad (old)
to teach as substitute for absent teacher
to help develop the border areas
